measurements_data.source: UN DESA (United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs). 2014b. In "World Urbanization Prospects: The 2014 Revision." Population Division, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, United Nations. June.

Nahum, Calixte Mesmer. n.d. "Republic of Benin - Organization and Operation of the Solid Waste Management Sector in Cotonou" ["Republique du Benin - Organisation et Fonctionnment de la Filiere de Gestion des Déchets Solides Ménagers à Cotonou"]. CIFAL (International Training Center of Local Authorities / Actors [Centre International de Formation des Autorites/Acteurs Locaux]) and AMBF (Association of Municipalities of Burkina Faso).
measurements_data.comments: 1 (708 tonnes/day); year assumed to be 2000 based on population level reported in source
